title: Undisclosed tinkering in Excel behind economics paper
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];A[label="Economics Paper Published
'Green innovations and patents in OECD countries'"];B[label="Concerns Raised
- Missing data in study
- Claims of 'balanced panel data'"];C[label="PhD Student Inquiry
- Contacted Author: Almas Heshmati"];D[label="Data Imputation Method
- Used Excel's autofill
- Copied data from adjacent countries"];E[label="Expert Opinions
- Andrew Harvey: Invalidates statistics
- Søren Johansen: 'Cheating'"];F[label="Lack of Transparency
- No mention of imputation in paper"];G[label="Consequences
- Paper's validity questioned
- Calls for retraction"];H[label="Author's Defense
- Acknowledged lack of explanation
- Justified imputation to avoid data loss"];A->B;B->C;C->D;D->E;E->F;F->G;H->F;}
